channel.title: Blogs on Weekly Automation
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Weekly Automation

item.title: The World of Shells and Terminals
item.description: Hey there! Do you know you don’t speak the same language as your computer? While you may be multilingual, your computer only speaks and understands one language. Binary. Right. You may be able to speak Spanish and English but your computer can only speak ones and zeros. How do I then make my computer do what I want it to do? The Kernel: The kernel is the core of the operating system (Think of the engine in a car).
